sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The Christian arte of thriving, whereby a man may become rich to God, or, A sermon vpon Matth.6.33 preached by the right reuerend father in God, George, Lord Bishop of Derry. Downame, George, d. 1634.
[2], 44 p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, At London : 1620.
"First seeke the kingdome of God, and his righteousnesse, and all these things shall be added vnto you." Signatures: A⁴(-A1) B-F⁴. Item at reel 591:10 identified as STC 7109a. Reproductions of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Harvard University Library.
=======
The Christian arte of thriving, whereby a man may become rich to God, or, A sermon vpon Matth.6.33 preached by the right reuerend father in God, George, Lord Bishop of Derry. Downame, George, d. 1634.
[2], 44 p.
Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, At London : 1620.
"First seeke the kingdome of God, and his righteousnesse, and all these things shall be added vnto you." Signatures: A⁴(-A1) B-F⁴. Item at reel 591:10 identified as STC 7109a. Reproductions of originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Harvard University Library.
Felix Kyngston
